metadata.title: CVE-2021-46088 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Zabbix 4.0 LTS, 4.2, 4.4, and 5.0 LTS is vulnerable to Remote Code Execution (RCE). Any user with the "Zabbix Admin" role is able to run custom shell script on the application server in the context of the application user.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
